entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
